website_summaries.verdict: Leads the pack for classic looks, versatile style, and quality build. A solid choice that won't disappoint.
pros: Sleek, simple nickel design that complements most curtains and décor
Adjusts from 72 to 144 inches for various window sizes
cons: Some owners report rusting when used in humid areas

customer_reviews.title: NOT a 2-PK!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Despite this being advertised as a 2-pack, I have only received one set of rods on FOUR occassions. The problem seems to be that the packaging says "2-PK" but only one rod is the new pack. There are two rods, but only one set of end caps and a total of 3 brackets for hanging. That constitures a single set per my experiences. Getting through to an Amazon representative has been impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: If you need the curtain rod to be on the longer side of the measurements listed, just get the longer one. I got the shorter one thinking that it will be perfect since it's max length is exactly what I needed as I was using it as a room divider, but I was wrong. The rod became flimsy and not stable at all, and there was no way to actually hand a curtain on it. Otherwise it looks nice, but it ended up not working out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Viola

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, good quality curtain rod
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking curtain rod. It makes our living room look much nicer than the previous rods. The quality is decent. Installation was typical for a curtain rod. There were no issues. When adjusting to a shorter length in the range, only 2 of the 3 rod segments are used, which was unexpected but not an issue. Recommended. Would buy again (and did.)
customer_reviews.author: Frank D Roosevelt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried that the rod would look too skinny but I love it. Easy to install and looks beautiful. I love Umbra hardware and the rod and matching clips don’t disappoint. I’m a happy camper though I made the curtains a little long and will have to take them in.
customer_reviews.author: Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Mounting brackets not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made from quality metal. My only complaint is that the mounting brackets, although very nice and heavy duty, appear to be "one size fits all" since the bracket appears to be made to fit up to a 1" bar but this bar is only 3/4" on the larger side. It looks a little funny that way, especially on the side with the even smaller bar that slides into the larger bar to make it adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... Sunny Side Ombre Sheer Window Curtains and it was perfect! Would love to say it was easy to ...

Would love to say it was easy to install but I don't find measuring to be easy to me as I want it to be 'perfect' but got them installed by myself nonetheless and it looks great! Thought they were a little expensive but liked the look of them and glad I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: MATEICH

customer_reviews.title: WAY LARGER THAN ADVERTISED! Over 90 inches minimum length

I was disappointed to find that the minimum length of this rod was way to long to hang over my 90" opening. I'd guess the rod is 100". Back it goes!

customer_reviews.title: Overall not bad but not stellar.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice but you definitely need more supports if you plan to extend it to the wider range and have decent curtains up. After about a month mine are sagging and the middle support completely came out of the wall at one point, possibly because of my wall so I can't fault it for that. My curtains are decently heavy, they're blackout curtains, but I would expect any curtain rod to be able to hold up for at least more than a month. Also, install was kind of a pain in the butt due to the screw positions, couldn't use the drill for the top screws that go into the wall

customer_reviews.title: NOT A 2 PACK...

You only receive 2 finnials not 4 making the second pole useless. I needed the rods for a corner window and attached the 2 poles with a corner piece so I was able to make it work. If you were to purchase the single pack, the rods are nice and simple. They are a slightly cheaper quality but ours are only decorative so it was a perfect option.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy

customer_reviews.title: beautiful but bent. false weight advertised.

I put one curtain panel on it, curtain panel is 8.70 lbs and the bar is BENT now even after moving curtain to side, bend is about 1in difference from middle of bar to the sides. Bar setup at 72 in. it's definitely not sturdy to hold the 8.70lbs yet 22lbs as you falsely advertise unless you suggest a dipping bent bar is okay. Will work great for those sheer meshy super light curtains, nothing heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a room divider curtain
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic curtain rod. I needed a rob long enough to extend across a 140 inch opening. I live in a small studio apartment, with a sleeping alcove. This curtain rod was perfect to hang a curtain in my apartment, creating a division between my living and sleeping spaces. It was easy to install, and includes 3 brackets that are complete "rings" instead of the "hook" style brackets that you typically find with curtain rods. This design was perfect, so I could hang the rob from the ceiling. It seems to be made of quality, durable material, and features a sleek, modern design. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Easy Style
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple, no frills, nickel curtain rod for an extra long set of windows (~140") in my living room. This rod was super easy to install and holds six 84" cotton curtains wonderfully. It comes with 2 end rods and a center extender rod that fits inside the end pieces to get you to your desired length. It also has three bracket mounts, which I installed on the ends and center and it supports everything with no sagging.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Powered

customer_reviews.title: Overall ok. Don't use in bathroom or humid area.

Overall they work and are the simple and modern look I wanted. Do not use in moist environment where there's steam!
